ISSUE.TITLE: Filter feature issue
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I have a table w/ columns accepting null value. A **nocodb filter** researching column w/ null value return 0 rows. (of course I have plenty of records normally matching the filter. Checked w/ Navicat)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): Filter correction added missing filter in where (not null) fix #295 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
